author: Marisa Schultz
title: Congressional resolution seeks international probe of China's coronavirus handling
description: Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo,. and Rep. Elise Stefanik, R-N.Y., are demanding China fork over money to nations afflicted with the novel coronavirus, arguing the Chinese Communist Party must pay for its "lies" about the early outbreak of the virus.
content:
